action.name: SetTarget
action.run:
luup.log("SetTarget for telldus device: " .. lul_settings.newTargetValue) if(lul_settings.newTargetValue == "1") then deviceCommand(luup.devices[lul_device].id, "turnOn") else deviceCommand(luup.devices[lul_device].id, "turnOff") end
luup.variable_set("urn:upnp-org:serviceId:SwitchPower1", "Status", lul_settings.newTargetValue, lul_device)
return true

action.name: Poll
action.run: task("Telldus sensor sync start", TASK_BUSY) -- Force refreshCache to get called in a Timer luup.call_timer("refreshCache", 1, "1", "")
